title: Unable to post on stuff because I'm level 6?
body: It say I can't comment on things because I'm level 6, feelsbadman. Any fixes?

replies.body: Sometimes an account has to sync to the boards when posting for the first time and update.  It looks like you're showing as level 30 now, so you should be able to post without issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=HodtAqUU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-24T17:15:15.322+0000)
>
> Sometimes an account has to sync to the boards when posting for the first time and update.  It looks like you're showing as level 30 now, so you should be able to post without issue.

Littt. Thanks fam
